name: PortEvent
description: An event generated by a port

content.name: WrangleStarted
content.description: the user has started a cable connection from this port

content.name: Wrangle
content.description: the user has continued moving the articulating end of a cable

content.name: WrangleStopped
content.description: the user has released the cable

content.name: Break
content.description: the user has requested that the port sever its connection

content.name: GainedConnection
content.description: this port has gained a connection

content.name: LostConnection
content.description: this port has lost a connection

content.name: Message
content.description: this port has received a message from a connected port
